item.title: How go verifies checksums of downloaded modules?
item.description: Introduction Checksums play a crucial role in ensuring the integrity of data by providing a unique fingerprint for a given set of information. Whether you’re a developer, system administrator, or just a curious individual, understanding how to calculate checksums manually can be a valuable skill. In this guide, we’ll explore the concept of checksums and walk through the steps of manually calculating them & compare with go.sum file. What is a Checksum?
